data.name: AppFullName
data.value: .NET modify solution file command

data.name: AppDescription
data.value: Command to add, remove, and list projects from the solution (SLN) file.

data.name: SolutionArgumentName
data.value: SLN_FILE

data.name: SolutionArgumentDescription
data.value: The solution file to operate on. If not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.

data.name: AppHelpText
data.value: Projects to add or to remove from the solution.

data.name: CouldNotFindFile
data.value: Could not find file `{0}`.

data.name: AddAppFullName
data.value: Add one or more projects to a solution file.

data.name: AddFileFullName
data.value: Add one or more solution items to a solution file.

data.name: AddProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: ProjectPathArgumentShouldNotBeProvidedForDotnetSlnAddFile
data.value: PROJECT_PATH should not be provided for `dotnet sln add file`

data.name: AddProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the projects to add to the solution.

data.name: AddFilePathArgumentName
data.value: FILE_PATH

data.name: AddFilePathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the solution items to add to the solution.

data.name: RemoveProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: RemoveProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the projects to remove from the solution.

data.name: SpecifyAtLeastOneFileToAdd
data.value: You must specify at least one file to add.

data.name: SolutionAlreadyContainsFile
data.value: The solution {0} already contains the solution item `{1}`

data.name: SolutionItemAddedToTheSolution
data.value: The solution item `{0}` was added to the solution folder `{1}`

data.name: RemoveAppFullName
data.value: Remove one or more projects from a solution file.

data.name: RemoveSubcommandHelpText
data.value: Remove the specified project(s) from the solution. The project is not impacted.

data.name: ListAppFullName
data.value: List all projects in a solution file.

data.name: ListSubcommandHelpText
data.value: List all projects in the solution.

data.name: ProjectsHeader
data.value: Project(s)

data.name: InRoot
data.value: Place project in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

data.name: AddFileInRootArgumentDescription
data.value: Place file in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

data.name: SolutionElementType
data.value: The type of the solution element to add or remove. Allowed values are project, item, and folder.

data.name: AddProjectSolutionFolderArgumentDescription
data.value: The destination solution folder path to add the projects to.

data.name: AddFileSolutionFolderArgumentDescription
data.value: The destination solution folder path to add the files to.

data.name: SolutionItemWithTheSameNameExists
data.value: There is already an existing solution item '{0}' with the same name in the solution folder '{1}'.

data.name: SolutionFolderAndInRootMutuallyExclusive
data.value: The --solution-folder and --in-root options cannot be used together; use only one of the options.

data.name: CannotAddTheSameSolutionToItself
data.value: Cannot add the same solution to itself.

data.name: CannotAddExistingProjectAsSolutionItem
data.value: An existing project cannot be added as a solution item.

data.name: ListSolutionFoldersArgumentDescription
data.value: Display solution folder paths.

data.name: SolutionFolderHeader
data.value: Solution Folder(s)

data.name: MigrateAppFullName
data.value: Generate a .slnx file from a .sln file.

data.name: SlnxGenerated
data.value: .slnx file {0} generated.

data.name: CannotMigrateSlnx
data.value: Only .sln files can be migrated to .slnx format.

data.name: SerializerNotFound
data.value: Could not read solution file {0}. Supported files are .sln and .slnx valid solutions.
